Description:
For 40 years, Windows has powered work. Now, Windows 11 redefines productivity and manageability - combining secure-by-design architecture, energy-efficient silicon, and seamless M365 and Copilot integration. Experience how Copilot+ PCs and agentic capabilities streamline workflows, automate tasks, and give IT leaders greater visibility, control, and operational intelligence for AI-powered future.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.

Title: Secure & Manage the Most Productive Intelligent OS: Windows 11 | BRK346
